CHAT.comment: JOSE ERNESTO MEDELLIN, Petitioner v. TEXAS.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DONALD F. DONOVAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. PAUL D. CLEMENT. ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES AS AMICUS CURIAE SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT of R. TED CRUZ, ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
(Whereupon, at 11:30 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
